items.name: Goan Alsande Tonak
items.description: A Goan dish made from kidney beans and potatoes. The "Tonak" masala has unique blend of whole spices which gives this dish it's iconic flavour.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Goan Prawns Umman
items.description: A delectable dish from the coastal state of Goa. Prawns cooked in a rich and flavorful coconut-based gravy, infused with aromatic spices like cumin, coriander, turmeric, and red chili. This dish encapsulates the essence of Goan cuisine, offering a harmonious blend of seafood and tropical flavors.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Goan Mashed Potato Chops
items.description: A delightful Goan snack made by stuffing mashed potatoes with a seasoned mixture of minced chicken, onions, green chilies, and spices. These potato patties are then coated in breadcrumbs and fried until golden brown. (4 pieces)

items.name: Goan Ross Omlette
items.description: A comforting food from Goa. Goan chicken curry cooked with coconut, garlic, onion and home made spice mix and topped with an omelette and fresh coriander. Served with 2 pav.

items.name: Gujarati Bhindi Ravaiyan
items.description: A delicious Gujarati dish made with okra (bhindi) and semolina (rava). The okra is saut√©ed with mustard seeds, cumin seeds, turmeric, and other spices until tender, and then mixed with roasted semolina to create a flavorful and textured dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 chapati + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bohri Lamb Curry
items.description: A rich and aromatic dish from the Bohra Muslim community, featuring tender lamb cooked in a fragrant gravy infused with a blend of traditional spices and herbs, offering a delightful taste
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Handvo
items.description: A traditional Gujarati savory cake made from a blend of rice, lentils, and vegetables. It's seasoned with spices, mustard seeds, curry leaves, and grated coconut, cooked on a griddle until crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, creating a flavorful and nutritious snack.

items.name: Gujrati Dal & Chawal
items.description: A light and flavorful lentil dish from Gujarat, prepared with tuvar dal and seasoned with a tempering of mustard seeds, cumin seeds, and aromatic spices, offering a delightful balance of sweetness and tanginess. Served with rice,

items.name: Mattu Gulla Huli
items.description: A traditional dish from Karnataka featuring Mattu Gulla (eggplants) cooked in a tangy and spicy gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Pandi Curry
items.description: A delicacy of Coorg. An intensly flavourful pork belly curry cooked with freshly made spices, onion, curry leaves and simmered away for the melt in your mouth flavour.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Sundal
items.description: A popular South Indian snack made with chickpeas and coconut packed with a lot of flavour.

items.name: Puli Sadam
items.description: A tangy South Indian rice dish, featuring cooked rice mixed with a spicy tamarind paste infused with aromatic spices, creating a burst of flavors in every mouthful, perfect for a satisfying meal

items.name: Paneer Tikka Aloo Dum Biryani
items.description: A flavorful Indian dish that combines marinated paneer tikka (grilled cottage cheese) and baby potatoes with aromatic biryani rice. The dish is layered and slow-cooked to perfection, allowing the spices and flavors to infuse into the rice, creating a rich and delicious one-pot meal. Served with raita + achar + papad.

items.name: Lucknowi Lamb Biryani
items.description: A fragrant and indulgent dish originating from the culinary traditions of Lucknow, India. It features tender pieces of lamb marinated in a blend of yogurt and spices, layered with aromatic long-grain Basmati rice, caramelized onions, saffron-infused milk, and a variety of spices. Slow-cooked to perfection. Served with raita + papad + achar.

items.name: Aloo Kathi Roll
items.description: A popular Indian street food made with a spiced potato filling wrapped in a soft, flaky paratha (Indian flatbread). The potatoes are cooked with onions, green chilies, ginger, and spices like cumin, coriander, and garam masala, creating a flavorful and hearty filling. The paratha is then rolled around the potato mixture along with some tangy chutney and crunchy onions to create a delicious and satisfying handheld snack.

items.name: Soya Pulao
items.description: A nutritious rice dish where fragrant basmati rice is cooked with protein-rich soya granules and aromatic spices, offering a delicious and wholesome vegetarian meal

items.name: Rajasthani Chana Chawal
items.description: A hearty Rajasthani dish made of spicy chickpeas, simmered in a rich blend of aromatic spices and yogurt.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Rajasthani Murg Handi Boote
items.description: A flavorful chicken curry from Rajasthan. Tender chicken pieces slow-cooked in a rich and creamy gravy infused with warm spices
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Pyaz ki Kachori
items.description: A crispy fried pastry from Rajasthan, filled with a spicy onion mixture and deep-fried until golden brown. (2 pieces)

items.name: Kheech
items.description: A delicious meal cooked with rice split green moong, ghee and spices

items.name: Vendakkai Mandi
items.description: A South Indian dish originating from the Chettinad cuisine. It's a delicious okra curry made with a tangy tamarind gravy and features soft, tender okra cooked in a rice-washed water called "mandi." The starch from the rice water adds a nice, gravy-like consistency to the dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Koli Milagu Masala
items.description: A fiery South Indian chicken dish featuring tender chicken pieces in a vibrant peppercorn and spice masala. Expect bold heat, aromatic spices, and a touch of South Indian magic.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Perpu Vada
items.description: Deep fried fritters made with soaked yellow moong, onions, ginger and green chillies. (4 pieces)

items.name: Ven Pongal
items.description: A savory and comforting South Indian breakfast dish made with rice, moong dal (lentil), and ghee

items.name: Gutti Vankaya Karu
items.description: A lip-smacking curry originating from Andhra Pradesh. It's a delightful dish featuring small, tender eggplants stuffed with a flavorful lentil and spice mixture, simmered in a rich and creamy peanut-coconut gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 chapati + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Naatu Kodi Kura
items.description: The dish refers to the gravy, which is a delicious concoction of spices and aromatics. The ingredients include a base of onions, tomatoes, ginger, garlic, and a blend of warm South Indian spices like coriander, cumin, turmeric, and chilies. The chicken is simmered in this flavorful gravy until tender, allowing the spices to infuse with the meat and create a deeply satisfying curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Mirchi Bhajji
items.description: Green chilli peppers dipped in a batter of chickpea flour and spices and deep fried for a crispy texture. The chilli used here is not the spicy variety. Served with some spicy green chutney. (6 bhajji)

items.name: Veg Pulao
items.description: Mixed vegtables cooked with whole spices and teamed with fragant basmati rice, caramalised onion and cashew nuts. Served with papad.

items.name: Paneer Bhuna Biryani
items.description: A flavorful vegetarian biryani made with layers of fragrant rice, tender paneer cubes, and a rich, spiced bhuna gravy. Expect warm spices, tangy tomato, creamy yogurt, and a touch of nutty richness. Served with yogurt raita + papad + achar.

items.name: Chameen Biryani
items.description: A unique and flavorful biryani variation with shrimp. It features layers of fluffy rice cooked with succulent pieces of shrimp, and a rich gravy infused with aromatic spices and coconut milk. Expect a delightful interplay of textures and a burst of flavor in every bite.

items.name: Chicken Cutlet
items.description: A popular snack or appetizer made with ground or minced chicken, mixed with spices, herbs, and other ingredients. The mixture is shaped into patties or cutlet shapes, coated with breadcrumbs and then shallow fried until golden and crispy. (4 cutlet)

items.name: Coconut Rice
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked in ghee with cashew, curry leaves, dried chilli and fresh coconut, tempered with mustard seeds.

items.name: Nadru Yakhni Pulao
items.description: A traditional Kashmiri rice dish made with fragrant basmati rice, tender lotus stem (nadru), and a flavorful yakhni broth made with yogurt & spices. The dish is garnished with fried onions, nuts, and fresh herbs, giving it a beautiful texture. Served with achar + papad.

items.name: Lamb Yakhni Pulao
items.description: A delicious and aromatic rice dish that is popular in Indian and Pakistani cuisine. The dish is made with tender lamb that has been slow-cooked in a flavorful broth (yakhni) made with aromatic spices and yogurt. The lamb and yakhni are then combined with fragrant basmati rice and cooked until tender, resulting in a flavorful and satisfying meal. Served with achar + papad.

items.name: Aloo Tikki Chaat
items.description: Potato patty fried and served with spicy and flavourful chickpea gravy topped with sweet and tangy tamrind sauce and spicy green chutney, onion, pomagrante seeds, fresh coriander, sev and chaat masala. A lip smacking snack found on the streets of India. (2 patties)

items.name: Spiced Curd Rice
items.description: A refreshing South Indian dish made with yogurt, cooked rice, and aromatic tadka (tempered spices).
